page.title: 05MR. DACK'S CORNER SHOP
page.content: { Mr Dack and his wife have run a general stores selling many different kinds of food and some stationary for 24 years.Their average day at the shop started at 7.30 a.m and finished at 6.00 p.m.He has recently retired,but thinks there is no need for any more shops in the area.His shop was always a general stores,as far as he could remember.His advice to people is not to open new shops,especially small ones,as Norwich is becoming very full of large shops such as department stores like Jarrolds,Debenhams and Bonds.Also hypermarkets on the outskirts have attracted many shoppers. Mr.Dack enjoyed his career very much.
